text: haey kar chhlaeyotb nei krom robsa keat( ai pr hi m)kmeanoavei krawpi peakyasamdi robsa puokke tha chaur puok anak samleab ke ryy dot ke noh laey . pelnoh a l laoh kaban sangkroh keat aoy ruochphot pi phleung noh . pitabrakd nasa nowknong rueng teangnoh kuchea phosdo tang samreab krom del mean chomnue
